definition: to move to tears (of a story)/tear-provoking (gas)/lacrimogen
to urge/to press/to prompt/to rush sb/to hasten sth/to expedite

sentences.english: Grab your tissues and find out in this touching weeper.
sentences.chinese: 掏出纸巾吧，在这部动人的催泪小说中找到答案。

sentences.english: The latest 4- hanky love story by the master of sweet, heartwarming romantic tales.
sentences.chinese: 纯爱小说大师的最新爱情催泪弹。

sentences.english: In fact, the most tear is a love letter chats.
sentences.chinese: 其实最催泪的情书是聊天记录。

sentences.english: Tear gas and bullets were used to disperse the crowd but emotions remained high.
sentences.chinese: 群众被催泪瓦斯和子弹驱散，但是情绪依然高张。

sentences.english: There were reports of teargas used against protesters.
sentences.chinese: 有报道称对示威者使用了催泪弹。

sentences.english: Riot police hurled tear gas canisters and smoke bombs into the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察向人群中投掷了催泪瓦斯罐和烟幕弹。

sentences.english: Tear-gas bombs were set off to break up the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 为驱散人群施放了催泪弹。

sentences.english: In some cities, police used batons and tear gas to control angry investors.
sentences.chinese: 在一些城市，警察用警棍及催泪弹控制愤怒的投资者。

sentences.english: When that didn't work, he used tear gas and live ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 不起作用时，他使用催泪瓦斯和实弹抵抗反动民众。

sentences.english: We are peacefully demonstrating while they are throwing tear gas and bullets," he said.
sentences.chinese: 我们在进行和平示威，而他们发射催泪瓦斯和枪弹。

sentences.english: Still breath'd in sighs, still usher'd with a tear.
sentences.chinese: 依然若叹息之呼吸，依然催泪。

sentences.english: The police used tear gas to subdue the rioters.
sentences.chinese: 警察用催泪毒气赶散暴乱者。

sentences.english: Just off Revolution Street, I walked into a pall of tear gas.
sentences.chinese: 刚走出革命街，我又被催泪瓦斯包围了。

sentences.english: Sometimes only when there is a shower of tear will we clear our sight.
sentences.chinese: 有时只会在有淋浴的催泪将我们清楚看到我们。

sentences.english: Grab your tissues and find out in this touching weeper .
sentences.chinese: 掏出纸巾吧，在这部动人的催泪小说中找到答案。

definition: to stir up emotion/to arouse sympathy/moving
